mixed.text: Push yourself, no one else is going to do it for you.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
Don’t limit your challenges, challenge your limits.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
It’s not about having time. It’s about making time.
You are stronger than you think.
Train insane or remain the same.
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
The only bad workout is the one that didn’t happen.
Small steps every day.
Don’t wish for it. Work for it.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Discipline equals freedom.
Be stronger than your excuses.
Fall in love with the process.
You don’t get the body you want by sitting on it.
Dream big. Start small. Act now.
Stay patient and trust the journey.
Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are.
Consistency is more important than perfection.
Make your body the sexiest outfit you own.
Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally. It comes from what you do consistently.
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
Sore today. Strong tomorrow.
Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
Mindset is everything.
Make it happen. Shock everyone.

gym.text: Push yourself, no one else is going to do it for you.
No pain, no gain. Shut up and train.
The body achieves what the mind believes.
Don’t limit your challenges, challenge your limits.
Sweat is fat crying.
Train insane or remain the same.
Wake up. Work out. Look hot. Kick ass.
Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
The only bad workout is the one that didn’t happen.
Work hard in silence. Let success be your noise.
Muscles are torn in the gym, fed in the kitchen, and built in bed.
You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
Success starts with self-discipline.
Excuses don’t burn calories.
You’re only one workout away from a good mood.
Your body can stand almost anything. It’s your mind you have to convince.
A one hour workout is 4% of your day. No excuses.
Don’t wish for a good body. Work for it.
Fall in love with taking care of your body.
You don’t get the ass you want by sitting on it.
Make time for it. Just get it done. Nobody ever got strong or in shape by thinking about it. They did it.
Work hard, stay consistent, and be patient.
Strong is the new sexy.
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
Champions keep playing until they get it right.
Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
Progress, not perfection.

motivation.text: Don’t wish for it. Work for it.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally. It comes from what you do consistently.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
Stay focused. Go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.
Don't stop until you're proud.
Push harder than yesterday if you want a different tomorrow.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
Your only limit is your mind.
Success is what happens after you have survived all your mistakes.
Be stronger than your excuses.
Discipline is doing what needs to be done, even if you don't want to do it.
If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Small progress is still progress.
You don’t find willpower, you create it.
Push through the pain. Growth is on the other side.
Excuses will always be there. Opportunity won’t.
Success is not for the lazy.
Be obsessed with your own potential.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
Act like it’s impossible to fail.
One day or day one. You decide.
You are capable of amazing things.
You are your only limit.
Progress, not perfection.
Work hard in silence. Let your success make the noise.

love.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Where there is love there is life.
We are most alive when we're in love.
Love is not what you say, love is what you do.
In your smile, I see something more beautiful than the stars.
You call it madness, but I call it love.
Love doesn’t make the world go ’round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
I look at you and see the rest of my life in front of my eyes.
Love is a friendship set to music.
To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
I fell in love with the way you touched me without using your hands.
Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
You don’t marry someone you can live with — you marry someone you cannot live without.
The best proof of love is trust.
I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
True love is rare, and it’s the only thing that gives life real meaning.
To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
Love doesn't need to be perfect. It just needs to be true.
Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
You make my heart smile.
Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
Your love is all I need to feel complete.
Loving you never was an option. It was a necessity.
I am who I am because of you.

success.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
Some people dream of success while others wake up and work hard at it.
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
Success means doing the best we can with what we have.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
Stop chasing the money and start chasing the passion.
Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise.
If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Don’t raise your voice, improve your argument.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Success is a journey, not a destination.
The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.
Success is earned one step at a time.
